title: Honour killing’ case: Dalit youth killed in Sambhajinagar city, wife says parents warned of Sairat-like revenge
selftext: Deputy Commissioner of Police Navneet Kumar Kavat said, "One person, Appasaheb Ashok Kirtishahi (35), has been arrested in this case.
comments: What kind of barbaric mentality is this ? How is a random accident of birth the marker of anything ?
